message.body: Hola Kenny! its Ingrid. I know u r leavin soon for Peru.would like to talk with u b4 u split. r u free for a chat 2nite? if so whats the best time 4 u? XO
Ingrid! Lo siento, my phone was dead all day. Can we chat tomorrow night? 8 your time-ish?
Thanks 4 getting back to me Ken. tonite would be great- will give ya a jingle! XO
Will call in a cple min!
Kenny whats yo email?havent reached my Peru friend Adrian yet but when I hear from him I will send u his info. BUEN VIAJE! DIVIERTENSE MUCHO! XO
Hola Kenny! not sure if u got my voice msg the other day.am wondering if u r free one of these eves to talk a brief bit? would like to share something with u.
Hola chica! I am so busy right now, sorry I haven't gotten back to you! I'll give you a call after rehearsal tonight, around 9 my time!
Gracias Kenny! no worries. c how ya feel after your gig. if u r tired&another days better I understand. que te tengas un dia fabuloso! XO
Am thinking of u & wishing u a ton of fun & having a blast opening your show Kenny! Im sure its gonna be a big hit! LOTSA LOVE XO
Thanks Ingrid!! We have had two sold out shows and great reviews so far...thanks for your support and love!
Way to go u amazing woman! Look fwd to talk with u more once things have calmed down over there. Ive got some exciting news to share! Te mando un abrazo grande!
